org.chemicalmozart.model.implementations.reactionrules

Class CreateBarRR

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.chemicalmozart.model.implementations.reactionrules.CreateBarRR
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReactionRule

    public class CreateBarRR
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReactionRule
    This ReactionRule is used to create a new bar into the main Solution. This is a one-shot rule, which means once it has reacted, the CreateBarRR is no longer in the Solution.

    Here is how it works :
    It takes two reagents :
    • BarNumber _number
    • QuaterPerBar _quater
    The computeSelect is not used.

    • Method Detail

      • computeResult

        public java.lang.Object[] computeResult()
        Create a new solution which represents a new bar. This solution must contains a BarInCreation object to be easily identifiable.
        The computeResult must create a new Solution which contains a copy of _number and a copy of _quater. Then it must increase _number by one. It must also contains an integer initialized to 0 which represents the current number of ChordImpl in the bar
        It must also return a MoveToResultRR and a QuaterLeft
        Specified by:
        computeResult in interface ReactionRule
        Returns:
        a table which contains the new solution described before, the initial _quater, and a new BarNumber with the value of _number increased by one.
        It also returns a MoveToResultRR and a QuaterLeft

      • computeSelect

        public boolean computeSelect()
        Is not used
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        true if the present reagents are compatible with the reaction.
